message:
g0v你好，月餘前曾透過朋友和g0v聯絡，因有克羅埃西亞的組織希望能夠交流。當時該組織負責人還在國外，最近行程結束返回克國，他很讚賞g0v在台灣的發展，表示會在近期內透過g0v-talks@googlegroups.com 與各位聯絡。

因為不確定可以轉寄給誰，他的email我貼在下面。如果g0v評估後有興趣，或許可以考慮與他的合作，他的email為 futurist.provjereno@gmail.com

謝謝!

-----

Dear Rebeca,

greetings from Croatia that is now entering autumn - temperatures
dropped to some 17 degrees C, and I could say that after hectic time form return to Croatia up to now, I finally have some time to rest …

Thank you, thank you, thank you so much for your really warm
hospitality, we are mentioning you day by day when speaking to our
friends about our tremendous Taiwan experience …

Thank you for providing me with links to of the G0V – really it is a
big open government organization in Taiwan.

It's really amazing that they have such a great support with some of
133.000 followers on its FB page …

When analyzing some figures, Taiwan has 5 time more people than
Croatia, who live on territory that is just 64 percent of Croatian
territory.

The population density in Taiwan is amongst highest in the World – 646 p./km2

Croatia has only 76 inhabitants per km2.

There is also a tendency of leaving Croatia (55.000, mostly young
professionals moved last year to Germany only!), so you may imagine that it is not easy to find a critical amount of qualified people for changes) …

Anyhow, FUTURIST (est. 2005) is trying to do the best to influence
public sphere, especially the legislation, but our members are
visiting-experts in other countries as well, more about it at:

 https://futuristngo.wordpress.com/

I was very busy last weeks as I prepare a conference for 400
participants (mostly public information officers) that will take place
in the Capital Zagreb on 7th of October as the first such a big event
in supporting the right on accessing the governmental data …

More about this Congress you could find (but only in Croatian) at

https://prvikongresszihrvatske.wordpress.com/

It would be great if there would be chances to cooperate with Taiwan NGOs, so after my conference I will try to reach the G0V via
g0v-talks@googlegroups.com, or you can also forward or rearange
informations from this e-mail for you friends that leads the G0V …

Regarding Watchout I used the on-line translator – so I may read about their activities  in English and Croatian as well about them …

They also look so promising for future cooperation …

As Croatia has one of the most liberal Law on the Right to Access
Information, the idea is to initiate cooperation of Asian end European experts … G0V maybe have a good insight on tendencies in this regard in Asian countries, and we can provide participants from all of 28 EU-member states, and have the Euro-Asian Forum on Right on Information on the place like this:

http://www.valamar.com/en/hotels-dubrovnik/valamar-lacroma-dubrovnik-hotel

or this one

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L8PtU6AqP9g

If there is such an interest I will be glad to start with preparations
of such Euro-Asian Forum ASAP.

Best regards, with the hope to meet you again ...

Nenad
story: Tzu-Yun Hung shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
name: FUTURIST
caption: futuristngo.wordpress.com

data.message: 說起來，g0v有常設的組織或是人員嗎?
有時間跳坑的話，我這裡現在就有一個很深的 ...

我開了一個相關的專案 「g0v 沒有人國際接待交流中心」
你可以請他將想要問的問題列在那邊的 Q&A
https://g0v.hackpad.com/g0v-International-Exchange-and-Cooperation-g0v--vu1UYfpDb1X

g0v 社群雖以分散發展專案為大方向，仍有以任務導向的群組：

【演講採訪群組】：三年前因應演講採訪漸多，有成立 g0v-talks 群組協調相關事宜：http://bit.ly/1FIWonZ

【舉辦黑客松工作群組】：有定期舉辦大松的揪松團、萌典松等。揪松團今年開始針對社群基礎建設有比較常態的投入。http://bit.ly/2dg5uFL

如果有明確想對談、合作的人，可請朋友直接聯繫，或寄到 g0v-talks，大家會協調。不過最後通常也以公開共筆、或請國外朋友上聊天室，讓更多人一起參與。
